TopicTitle: The Name Change Thread (WARNING! ONE TIME ONLY!)

Articles.Content: Can you change mine to Wjolcz?
Could I have my name changed to Gaming Kraken? When I created this account some years ago I still hadn't chosen a permanent username, now that I have one I would like to request a name change.
We're not ignoring these, guys. It's just that the forum admins are busy with the recent updates.

**Edited <time datetime="2018-04-01T20:14:33Z" title="04/01/2018 08:14  PM" data-short="6 yr">April 1, 2018</time> by Roovy**
It's the first pinned thread in this subforum.
Merged.

[@Roovy](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/144886-roovy/) Now that Vanamonde has moved your post over here, you can request your name change here in this thread. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")

[@Deddly](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/index.php?/profile/62955-deddly/) Alright, thank you very much! I love the work you admins and moderators are doing. Great community.

Anyway, it would be lovely if you changed my username from "Roovy" to "DesertCookie", as this is the pseudonym I now use. Thank you very much!
